column4: Argh... Yet again proving my point of Linux still not being suitable for use by "normal" people (me considering myself quite a nerd...)
I'm trying to get Ubuntu onto a White Macbook, and it is just seeming impossible :S
Boots up, see the purple screen, after that a blinkin underline ( _ ) and then just some randomness before the disk stops spinning and everything stopping....
I know exactly what you mean, but if you purchase a laptop with linux in mind, you usually get pretty lucky.
